hero.title: xMatix Partners
hero.description1: Align incentives. Govern execution. Scale ecosystems.
hero.description2: xMatix Partners helps organizations execute and govern partner operations across distributors, resellers, and ecosystem partners with consistent workflows and clear accountability.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Partner operations often lack visibility, consistency, and enforcement across organizations.
list: Incentives and rules are applied inconsistently

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Partners standardizes how partner activities are executed and governed so every partner follows the same rules and processes.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Partners modernizes partner execution without replacing existing CRM or partner systems while improving visibility, trust, and scale.

cardsData.title: Partner Lifecycle Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate onboarding, enablement, orders, and settlements through standardized workflows.

cardsData.title: Policy and Contract Enforcement
cardsData.description: Ensure partners follow agreed terms, pricing rules, and compliance requirements.

cardsData.title: Performance and Incentive Alignment
cardsData.description: Link partner actions to outcomes and rewards.

cardsData.title: Cross Organization Coordination
cardsData.description: Connect partner actions with internal sales, finance, and operations.

cardsData.title: Audit and Compliance Readiness
cardsData.description: Maintain complete partner execution records and approvals.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Partners in Action
requestADemo.description: Improve partner performance, reduce disputes, and maintain control across your ecosystem without disrupting existing systems.
